column4: Can someone please assist me in enabling permissions for read/write? I have a copied a few folders onto my desktop, but their emblem has a little lock and I can't cut/paste those folders into a different directory.
what says console if you type la -la ?
doesn't give me access to those folders for read/write
It lists all the folders I have on my desktop that are restricted from read/write access. captainFuture.
how?... I tried the chown command all it does is list every single file in each folder then claims it's retained to me.
oh I need to do them to every single folder, captainfuture?
I'm sorry but this command isn't doing anything: illriginal@illriginal:~/Desktop$ sudo chown -R illriginal:users /home/illriginal/Desktop/A
